description: Shnorhali ew paragay iwr [Shnorhali and His Times], by Levon (Ghewond) Alishan (Venice, 1873). A detailed study of the life, times, and works of Saint Nerses Shnorhali ("The Gracious" or "The Graceful") (1098-1173), kat'oghikos of the Armenian Church (1166-1173), poet, theologian, and philologist, in 641 pdf pages. File size: 14.6 MB. * Bar'aran surb grots' handerdz patkerok' [Illustrated Dictionary of the Bible]

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials

title: Shnorhali ew paragay iwr [Shnorhali and His Times]
